p: Divorce Granted.—The bonds of matrimony heretofore existing between Richard S. Pinnell and Eliza Olive Pinnell were dissolved by Judge Lewis in Chambers this week. The grounds on which her petition was granted, were habitual drunkenness on his part, and failure to make provision for her support. The custody of the children was awarded to her, and he was adjudged to pay all the costs of action.
